tfff 0.0.0.9000

Comma formatting

Source: R/comma.R
tfff-comma.Rd

These functions create comma labels. They are mostly just wrappers around scales::comma(), scales::label_comma() and ggplot2::scale_(x|y)_continuous(). But they do have the extra convenience built in that the scale functions already use comma formatting.

Usage

tfff_label_comma(accuracy = 0.1, ...)

tfff_comma(values, accuracy = 0.1, ...)

tfff_scale_x_comma(...)

tfff_scale_y_comma(...)

Arguments

accuracy

Accuracy of labels (e.g. 0.1 or 0.01)

...

Other arguments that are passed to `scales::comma()`, `scales::label_comma()` or `ggplot2::scale_(x|y)_continuous`

values

Values to be formatted

Value

A character vector of comma labels or a ggplot2 scale.
